name: India
interesting_fact: India is the world's largest democracy.

name: United States
interesting_fact: The U.S. has the world's largest economy.

name: China
interesting_fact: China is home to the Great Wall, the longest man-made structure in the world.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil is the only country in South America where Portuguese is the official language.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is both a country and a continent, known for the Great Barrier Reef.

name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has the world's third-largest economy.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is known for its engineering and is the largest economy in Europe.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.
